apps.name: SideStore
apps.versionDescription:
Ah, September! You are a doorway to the season that awakens another sidestore update! We have been very busy with doing quality of life changes and fixing bugs everyone’s been having. 


 What's Changed: 

 - UI Improvements for the Anisette Servers View. by @0-Blu in #672 

 - Added more feedback options. by @0-Blu in #673 

 - Fix SideJITServer Support for iOS 17+ by @stossy11 in #674 

 - Makes revoking optional by @junepark678 in #675 

 -  Better pairing file info by @bogotesr in #676  

 -  Selective app extension removal by @junepark678 in #677 

 -  legal: developer's certificate of origin 1.1 by @polymo1 in #686 

 Thanks to all of the community’s support to keep this project alive and motivated. We have more planned ahead and are doing our best to keep up with updates to make it a seamless/stress free experience. Stay tuned to our progress on future endeavors for SideStore on our discord! 

 Discord: https://discord.gg/sidestore-949183273383395328
apps.localizedDescription:
SideStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

SideStore allows you to sideload other .ipa files and apps from the Files app or via the SideStore Library

versions.localizedDescription:
Ah, September! You are a doorway to the season that awakens another sidestore update! We have been very busy with doing quality of life changes and fixing bugs everyone’s been having.

 -  Better pairing file info by @bogotesr in #676  

 -  Selective app extension removal by @junepark678 in #677

 Thanks to all of the community’s support to keep this project alive and motivated. We have more planned ahead and are doing our best to keep up with updates to make it a seamless/stress free experience. Stay tuned to our progress on future endeavors for SideStore on our discord!

permissions.usageDescription: SideStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows SideStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

news.title: Welcome to SideStore!
news.caption: Check out the Documentation for more info

news.title: Proceed with Caution!
news.caption: SideStore is currently pre-release software. Expect bugs, and please report them
